00020 #include <rdkcore/logging/logging.h>
00021 #define LOGGING_MODULE "RStereoImageHeightsData"
00022 
00023 #include "rstereoimageheightsdata.h"
00024 
00025 namespace RDK2 { namespace RSensorData {
00026 
00027 bool RStereoImageHeightsData::loadFromLogLine(cstr line)
00028 {
00029     istringstream iss(line);
00030     string rtag;
00031     iss >> rtag;
00032     if (rtag != "STEREOIMAGEHEIGHTS") {
00033         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("The log line must start with STEREOIMAGEHEIGHTS");
00034         return false;
00035     }
00036     int pts;
00037     iss >> pts;
00038     heights.resize(pts);
00039     for (int i = 0; i < pts; i++) {
00040         iss >> heights[i].p.x >> heights[i].p.y >> heights[i].height;
00041     }
00042     iss >> odometryPose.x >> odometryPose.y >> odometryPose.theta;
00043     iss >> estimatedPose.x >> estimatedPose.y >> estimatedPose.theta;
00044     int ts;
00045     iss >> ts;
00046     timestamp.setMsFromMidnight(ts);
00047     iss >> ipc_hostname;
00048     ipc_timestamp = timestamp;
00049     return true;
00050 }
00051 
00052 string RStereoImageHeightsData::getLogLine() const
00053 {
00054     ostringstream oss;
00055     oss << "STEREOIMAGEHEIGHTS " << heights.size() << " ";
00056     for (size_t i = 0; i < heights.size(); i++) {
00057         oss << heights[i].p.x << " " << heights[i].p.y << " " << heights[i].height << " ";
00058     }
00059     oss << odometryPose.x << " ";
00060     oss << odometryPose.y << " ";
00061     oss << odometryPose.theta << " ";
00062     oss << estimatedPose.x << " ";
00063     oss << estimatedPose.y << " ";
00064     oss << estimatedPose.theta << " ";
00065     oss << timestamp.getMsFromMidnight() << " ";
00066     oss << ipc_hostname << " ";
00067     oss << ipc_timestamp.getMsFromMidnight();
00068     return oss.str();
00069 }
